name: Ancient Bones
description: Old bones found deep in the forests of the Grand Line. Rumored to belong to extinct sea beasts.

name: Treasure Chest
description: A heavy chest filled with gold, jewels, and the hopes of every pirate crew.

name: Ancient Coin
description: A gold coin from the Void Century. Collectors would pay handsomely for one.

name: Dungeon Key
description: An ornate key that unlocks mysterious dungeons scattered across the New World.

name: Mystery Map
description: A weathered map that leads to hidden riches. But beware â€” some maps are traps!

name: Rare Pearl
description: A gleaming pearl said to contain the song of a mermaid. Very valuable to jewelers.

name: Pirate Flag
description: A tattered Jolly Roger flown by forgotten pirate crews. A symbol of freedom and rebellion.

name: Coral Fragment
description: A small piece of glowing coral. Used by craftsmen to decorate weapons and armors.

name: Devil Fruit Fragment
description: A fragment of a destroyed Devil Fruit. Extremely rare and radiates mysterious power.

name: Golden Compass
description: A compass that always points to the greatest treasure nearby â€” or so the legends claim.

name: Message in a Bottle
description: A bottle washed ashore containing a faded letter â€” maybe from a lost pirate or a dreamer.

name: Whetstone
description: Used to sharpen blades, slightly improving a weaponâ€™s effectiveness.

name: Mysterious Egg
description: An egg that glows faintly. No one knows what creature lies within â€” perhaps a Mythical Beast.

name: Shell Necklace
description: A handmade necklace crafted by merfolk. Said to bring good luck to sailors.

name: Seastone Shard
description: A fragment of pure Seastone. Negates Devil Fruit powers and is used in advanced weapons.
